title: Sticky Navbar Pattern
content: Use position sticky with top-0 and z-50. Always set a background color to avoid transparency issues.

title: Sticky Navbar Pattern
content: Use position sticky with top-0 and z-50. Always set a background color to avoid transparency issues.

title: Navbar Component Pattern
content: Create a sticky navbar with Tailwind. Use 'sticky top-0 z-50 bg-white shadow-md'. Include logo on left, navigation links in center, and CTA button on right.

title: Button Component Pattern
content: Create reusable button with variants: 'primary' (bg-blue-600), 'secondary' (bg-gray-600), 'danger' (bg-red-600). Accept size prop: 'sm', 'md', 'lg'. Use Tailwind classes.

title: Card Component Pattern
content: Create a card with rounded corners, shadow, and padding. Structure: header with title, body with content, optional footer with actions. Use 'rounded-lg shadow-lg p-6'.

title: Form Component Pattern
content: Create accessible forms with proper labels, error states, and validation. Use controlled components with React hooks. Show error messages in red below inputs.

title: React Component Best Practices
content: Use functional components with hooks. Extract reusable logic into custom hooks. Use TypeScript for type safety. Keep components small and focused on single responsibility.

title: Navbar Pattern
content: Sticky navbar: use 'sticky top-0 z-50 bg-white'. Include logo, links, CTA button.

title: Button Pattern
content: Reusable button with primary/secondary variants. Use Tailwind classes.

title: Navbar Pattern
content: Sticky navbar: use 'sticky top-0 z-50 bg-white'. Include logo, links, CTA button.

title: Button Pattern
content: Reusable button with primary/secondary variants. Use Tailwind classes.

title: Hero Section Pattern
content: Hero section with headline, subheadline, CTA button, and background. Use h1 for headline, p for subtitle. Make it visually striking with large text and good spacing.

title: Navbar Pattern
content: Sticky navbar with logo on left, nav links in center, CTA on right. Use 'sticky top-0 z-50'. Include shadow for depth. Make it responsive with mobile menu.

title: Carousel/Slider Pattern
content: Image carousel with prev/next buttons and indicators. Use useState for current slide. Include smooth transitions with transform. Auto-advance optional.

title: Footer Pattern
content: Footer with multiple columns: company info, links, social media. Use grid layout. Include copyright notice. Dark background with light text works well.

title: Navbar Component Pattern
content: Sticky navigation bar with logo, links, and CTA button. Use 'sticky top-0 z-50 bg-white shadow-md'. Common props: links[], logo, ctaText.

title: Button Component Pattern
content: Reusable button with variants (primary, secondary, danger). Props: variant, size, disabled, onClick. Use Tailwind for styling.

title: Form Component Pattern
content: Controlled form with validation. Use useState for form state, validate onBlur, show errors below fields. Common fields: email, password.

title: Card Component Pattern
content: Flexible card container. Structure: header (optional), body, footer (optional). Use 'rounded-lg border shadow-sm' for styling.

title: Modal Component Pattern
content: Modal dialog with backdrop. Use portal (createPortal) to render outside parent. Props: isOpen, onClose, title, children.
